benefitsCards.title: EE Video Pass
features: Stream your favorite shows without denting your data allowance
Includes loads of your favorite apps, such as YouTube, BBC iPlayer, Netflix, Amazon Prime Video and BT Sport
Fully flexible, with no contract
Use anywhere in the EU
You must have some data allowance remaining to use this

insuranceCards.title: Unprotected
insuranceCards.name: isurance-addon
insuranceCards.description: I do not want an EE insurance product and understand that if my device is lost, stolen or damaged, EE will not replace my device and I will still be required to pay for my contract.

insuranceCards.title: Full Cover
insuranceCards.name: isurance-addon
insuranceCards.description: This product would suit the needs of a customer who would like to cover their mobile phone or connected device in the event of loss, theft and accidental damage.

dealBonus.text: Receive a free screen protector worth £19.99

insuranceCards.title: Damage Cover
insuranceCards.name: isurance-addon
insuranceCards.description: This product would suit the needs of a customer who would like to cover their mobile phone or connected device in the event of accidental damage.
